title: Return please my orienna
body:
I bought Orienna two time while.
I don't know how I could bought two time.
And then I tried to return one Orianna, but both orienna is gonne.
And i just lose my 4800 RP point.

So, please check and then return Orianna or RP point.

replies.body:
Hey YoungTaeMon,

As others have suggested, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your account and see what may have happened.
Do a support ticket. Don't post on Boards. They don't really pay attention to posts like these.
Send in a support ticket, you will get a response quicker that way
